concept.title: 19.802 Determining eligibility for the 8(a) program.

conbody.p: Determining the eligibility of a small business to be a participant in the 8(a) program is the responsibility of the SBA. SBAâ€™s regulations on eligibility requirements for participation in the 8(a) program are found at 13 CFR 124.101 through 124.112.
